member.summary: Adds the specified listing to the cached listings. Call WriteListings to save the new listing to disc.

The data to write.

member.summary: Reads the specified number of bytes from the stream from the current position into the buffer at the specified offset or as many bytes as are available before the end of the stream is met.

The offset within the buffer to start storing read data at.

The offset within the buffer to start writing from.
The number of bytes to write.
